two iron nails were found in the tomb , one on the ground and one actually inside an ossuary , and , according to the film , mysteriously disappeared shortly after .根据影片，在古墓里发现两颗铁钉，一颗在地上，另一颗钉在尸骨上，然而不久后便神秘消失。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from late Latin ossuarium, formed irregularly from Latin os, oss- 'bone'

means.word_mean: 1. any receptacle for the burial of human bones
